verses.verse: A <S%H8605>Prayer<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H6664>right,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H7181>attend<s%> to my <S%H7440>cry,<s%> give <S%H238>ear<s%> to my <S%H8605>prayer,<s%> that goes not out of <S%H4820>feigned<s%> <S%H8193>lips.<s%>
Let my <S%H4941>sentence<s%> <S%H3318>come<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> from your <S%H6440>presence;<s%> let your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H2372>behold<s%> the things that are <S%H4339>equal.<s%>

You have <S%H974>proved<s%> my <S%H3820>heart;<s%> you have <S%H6485>visited<s%> me in the <S%H3915>night;<s%> you have <S%H6884>tried<s%> me, and shall <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H1077>nothing;<s%> I am <S%H2161>purposed<s%> that my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> shall not <S%H5674>transgress.<s%>
Concerning the <S%H6468>works<s%> of <S%H120>men,<s%> by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of your <S%H8193>lips<s%> I have <S%H8104>kept<s%> me from the <S%H734>paths<s%> of the <S%H6530>destroyer.<s%>
<S%H8551>Hold<s%> up my <S%H838>goings<s%> in your <S%H4570>paths,<s%> that my <S%H6471>footsteps<s%> <S%H4131>slip<s%> not.
I have <S%H7121>called<s%> on you, for you will <S%H6030>hear<s%> me, O <S%H410>God:<s%> <S%H5186>incline<s%> your <S%H241>ear<s%> to me, and <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H565>speech.<s%>

Show your <S%H6395>marvelous<s%> loving <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> O you that <S%H3467>save<s%> by your <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> them which put their <S%H2620>trust<s%> in you from those that <S%H6965>rise<s%> up against them.
<S%H8104>Keep<s%> me as the <S%H380>apple<s%> <S%H1323><s%> of the <S%H5869>eye,<s%> <S%H5641>hide<s%> me under the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of your <S%H3671>wings,<s%>
From the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> that <S%H7703>oppress<s%> me, from my <S%H5315>deadly<s%> <S%H341>enemies,<s%> who <S%H5362>compass<s%> me about.
They are <S%H5462>enclosed<s%> in their own <S%H2459>fat:<s%> with their <S%H6310>mouth<s%> they <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H1348>proudly.<s%>
They have <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H5437>compassed<s%> us in our <S%H838>steps:<s%> they have <S%H7896>set<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H5186>bowing<s%> <S%H5186>down<s%> to the <S%H776>earth;<s%>
<S%H1825>Like<s%> as a <S%H738>lion<s%> that is <S%H3700>greedy<s%> of his <S%H2963>prey,<s%> and as it were a <S%H3715>young<s%> <S%H3715>lion<s%> <S%H3427>lurking<s%> in <S%H4565>secret<s%> places.

<S%H6965>Arise,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H6923>disappoint<s%> him, <S%H3766>cast<s%> him <S%H3766>down:<s%> <S%H6403>deliver<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> which is your <S%H2719>sword:<s%>

From <S%H4962>men<s%> which are your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> from <S%H4962>men<s%> of the <S%H2465>world,<s%> which have their <S%H2506>portion<s%> in this <S%H2416>life,<s%> and whose <S%H990>belly<s%> you <S%H4390>fill<s%> with your <S%H6845>hid<s%> treasure: they are <S%H7646>full<s%> of <S%H1121>children,<s%> and <S%H5117>leave<s%> the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of their substance to their <S%H5768>babes.<s%>
As for me, I will <S%H2372>behold<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> in <S%H6664>righteousness:<s%> I shall be <S%H7646>satisfied,<s%> when I <S%H6974>awake,<s%> with your <S%H8544>likeness.<s%>
